name: LDAX: Ludum Dare Asset Exchange
description:
LDAX - Ludum Dare Asset Exchange

Create your very own cryptocurrency and get rich quick by BUYING LOW and SELLING HIGH

What's the highest Cash you can reach? How about Total value? How many cryptos did you have to abandon on the way to your victory? Is there really any way to win, other than to stop playing? LDAX truly is fun for the whole family!

Please vote on the Ludum Dare page

Source: https://github.com/foolmoron/LDAX
